overview: Jae Min tries to rob his own house with the help of his friend, Young Min. When Jae Min’s attempt fails, Young Min brings a friend, Hyun Jin, who has a car. The following day, Jae Min tries to break into his house again, this time with Hyun Jin. But Jae Min soon realizes involving Hyun Jin was a big mistake, and desperately tries to stop him, but things take a wrong turn and there’s no turning back.
title: Intruder
